entry.title: Stunning Interstellar Posters by James Fletcher
entry.content:
Via Ultralinx:

I saw “Interstellar” last week and it blew my mind. It is a really good film that not only has you sitting on the edge of your seat for almost three hours, but also inspires you to extend your knowledge about the Universe and quantum physics.

Awesome! Also if you want Interstellar wallpaper for your iOS device, Jim Gresham has been posted it on iDownloadblog

entry.title: This Is How Much Interns Make at Top Tech Companies
entry.content:
Via Ultralinx:

Dropbox tops the list in terms of total takeaway every month at $13,500, with LinkedIn second at $12,600 and Amazon and Foursquare tied at third both offering $11,000.

Gile, ndro!1

  1. menatap slip gaji dengan mata berkaca-kaca ↩
